description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，为孙吴势力的奠基者。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty who laid the foundation for the state of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年武将，长沙太守，孙策与孙权的父亲。
description.en: A military general and warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty, father of Sun Ce and Sun Quan.

description.zh-cn: 孙坚的妻子，孙策与孙权的母亲。
description.en: Wife of Sun Jian, mother of Sun Ce and Sun Quan.

description.zh-cn: 孙策之弟，孙吴的第一位皇帝。
description.en: Younger brother of Sun Ce, the first emperor of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名将，孙策的总角之交与重要将领。
description.en: A famous general in the late Eastern Han dynasty, a close friend and key general of Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年军阀，孙策曾一度在其麾下。
description.en: A warlord in the late Eastern Han dynasty whom Sun Ce once served.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期由孙权建立的政权，其基础由孙策奠定。
description.en: A state during the Three Kingdoms period founded by Sun Quan, with its foundation laid by Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年名士，孙策的谋士，为孙策规划了平定江东的战略。
description.en: A famous scholar in the late Eastern Han dynasty and an advisor to Sun Ce, who devised the strategy for conquering Jiangdong.

description.zh-cn: 东汉扬州刺史，被孙策击败。
description.en: The Inspector of Yang Province during the Eastern Han dynasty, defeated by Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉会稽太守，被孙策击败。
description.en: The Administrator of Kuaiji Commandery during the Eastern Han dynasty, defeated by Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年吴郡一带的贼帅，被孙策击败。
description.en: A bandit leader in Wu Commandery during the late Eastern Han dynasty, defeated by Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年武将，初为刘繇部下，后归顺孙策。
description.en: A military general in the late Eastern Han dynasty, initially served under Liu Yao before surrendering to Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年刘表麾下将领，对孙坚之死负有责任。
description.en: A general under Liu Biao in the late Eastern Han dynasty, responsible for the death of Sun Jian.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年权臣，曹魏的奠基者。
description.en: A powerful minister in the late Eastern Han dynasty and the founder of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 孙策和孙权的重臣，受孙策临终托孤。
description.en: A key minister serving Sun Ce and Sun Quan, entrusted by Sun Ce on his deathbed to assist Sun Quan.

description.zh-cn: 东汉吴郡太守，被孙策所杀，其门客后刺杀了孙策。
description.en: The Administrator of Wu Commandery during the Eastern Han dynasty, killed by Sun Ce. His retainers later assassinated Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 桥公长女，孙策之妻。
description.en: Elder daughter of Qiao Gong, wife of Sun Ce.

description.zh-cn: 孙策为奠定孙吴基业而在江东地区进行的一系列军事行动。
description.en: A series of military campaigns conducted by Sun Ce in the Jiangdong region to establish the foundation of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 建安四年冬，孙策为报父仇而对黄祖发动的战役。
description.en: A battle launched by Sun Ce against Huang Zu in the winter of 199 to avenge his father's death.

description.zh-cn: 历仕孙坚、孙策、孙权三代的老将。
description.en: An old general who served three generations: Sun Jian, Sun Ce, and Sun Quan.

description.zh-cn: 泾县山贼总帅，曾袭击孙策，后被孙策收降。
description.en: A bandit leader from Jing County who once attacked Sun Ce but was later pacified and recruited by him.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年庐江太守，被孙策用计击败。
description.en: The Administrator of Lujiang Commandery in the late Eastern Han dynasty, defeated by Sun Ce through strategy.

description.zh-cn: 桥公次女，周瑜之妻。
description.en: Younger daughter of Qiao Gong, wife of Zhou Yu.

description.zh-cn: 东汉末年人物，大乔和小乔的父亲。
description.en: A figure in the late Eastern Han dynasty, father of Da Qiao and Xiao Qiao.

description.zh-cn: 孙策是孙坚的长子。
description.en: Sun Ce is the eldest son of Sun Jian.

description.zh-cn: 孙策是吴夫人的儿子。
description.en: Sun Ce is the son of Lady Wu.

description.zh-cn: 孙权是孙策的二弟。
description.en: Sun Quan is Sun Ce's younger brother.

description.zh-cn: 孙策在攻克皖城后娶大桥为妻。
description.en: Sun Ce married Da Qiao after conquering Wan Castle.

description.zh-cn: 周瑜在攻克皖城后娶小桥为妻。
description.en: Zhou Yu married Xiao Qiao after conquering Wan Castle.

description.zh-cn: 大桥是桥公的长女。
description.en: Da Qiao is the elder daughter of Qiao Gong.

description.zh-cn: 小桥是桥公的次女。
description.en: Xiao Qiao is the younger daughter of Qiao Gong.

description.zh-cn: 孙策与周瑜自少年时期便是情如兄弟的好友，周瑜在孙策起兵时便率兵物资来投，是其重要的支持者和将领。
description.en: Sun Ce and Zhou Yu were close friends like brothers since their youth. Zhou Yu joined Sun Ce with troops and supplies when he began his campaign, becoming a key supporter and general.

description.zh-cn: 孙策在父亲孙坚死后，为讨回旧部曾一度在袁术麾下效力。
description.en: After his father Sun Jian's death, Sun Ce briefly served under Yuan Shu to reclaim his father's former troops.

description.zh-cn: 袁术僭越称帝后，孙策与其断绝关系，并参与了对袁术的讨伐。
description.en: After Yuan Shu declared himself emperor, Sun Ce broke ties with him and participated in the campaign against him.

description.zh-cn: 孙策通过平定江东，为日后孙吴政权的建立奠定了坚实的基础。
description.en: By conquering Jiangdong, Sun Ce laid a solid foundation for the future state of Eastern Wu.

description.zh-cn: 孙策通过平定江东一系列战役，建立了自己在该地区的统治。
description.en: Through a series of battles to conquer Jiangdong, Sun Ce established his rule in the region.

description.zh-cn: 孙策在曲阿之战中击败了时任扬州刺史的刘繇，夺取了其在江东的控制权。
description.en: Sun Ce defeated Liu Yao, then Inspector of Yang Province, in the Battle of Qu'e, seizing his control over Jiangdong.

description.zh-cn: 孙策进攻会稽，击败了太守王朗，平定了会稽郡。
description.en: Sun Ce attacked Kuaiji, defeated its administrator Wang Lang, and pacified the commandery.

description.zh-cn: 孙策进攻吴郡，击败了当地贼帅严白虎。
description.en: Sun Ce attacked Wu Commandery and defeated the local bandit leader Yan Baihu.

description.zh-cn: 在襄阳之战中，孙坚遭到刘表部下黄祖的伏击而阵亡。
description.en: During the Battle of Xiangyang, Sun Jian was ambushed and killed by Huang Zu, a subordinate of Liu Biao.

description.zh-cn: 孙策在沙羡之战中大败黄祖，为其父孙坚报仇。
description.en: Sun Ce decisively defeated Huang Zu in the Battle of Shaxian, avenging his father Sun Jian.

description.zh-cn: 孙策用计袭击刘勋的根据地皖城，将其击败并夺取庐江郡。
description.en: Sun Ce used a strategy to attack Liu Xun's base at Wan Castle, defeating him and seizing Lujiang Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 孙策因忌惮吴郡太守许贡的名望而将其诛杀。
description.en: Sun Ce executed Xu Gong, the Administrator of Wu Commandery, out of fear of his reputation.

description.zh-cn: 孙策被已故吴郡太守许贡的门客刺杀身亡。
description.en: Sun Ce was assassinated by the retainers of the late Wu Commandery Administrator Xu Gong.

description.zh-cn: 孙策临终前，将自己的印绶和兵符交给二弟孙权，选择他作为自己的继承人。
description.en: On his deathbed, Sun Ce passed his seal and military authority to his younger brother Sun Quan, choosing him as his successor.

position.en: General Who Attacks Rebels, Marquis of Wu

description.zh-cn: 因孙策讨伐袁术有功，曹操表奏朝廷授予孙策讨逆将军官职并加封为吴侯。
description.en: Due to Sun Ce's merits in the campaign against Yuan Shu, Cao Cao petitioned the court to grant Sun Ce the title of 'General Who Attacks Rebels' and ennoble him as the Marquis of Wu.

description.zh-cn: 张纮在江都为孙策分析天下大势，规划了平定江东的战略蓝图（江都对），坚定了孙策创立基业的决心。
description.en: In Jiangdu, Zhang Hong analyzed the political landscape for Sun Ce and devised a strategic blueprint for conquering Jiangdong (the Jiangdu Dialogue), solidifying Sun Ce's determination to establish his own domain.

description.zh-cn: 太史慈原为刘繇部下，在神亭岭与孙策交战。后被孙策俘获，孙策亲自为其松绑并委以重任，太史慈遂归顺。
description.en: Tai Shi Ci initially served Liu Yao and fought Sun Ce at Shenting Ridge. He was later captured by Sun Ce, who personally untied him and entrusted him with important tasks, leading to Tai Shi Ci's allegiance.

description.zh-cn: 在孙策被祖郎围困时，程普奋勇当先，策马持矛突围，保护孙策得以脱险。
description.en: When Sun Ce was besieged by Zu Lang, Cheng Pu bravely charged forward with his horse and spear, breaking through the encirclement and protecting Sun Ce to safety.

description.zh-cn: 孙权称帝后，追谥其兄孙策为长沙桓王。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Sun Quan posthumously honored his elder brother Sun Ce as Prince Huan of Changsha.
